column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Let me start by saying this is the best crab cake and fillet mignon I've ever had. The crab cake was seared on the outside
column2: and creamy inside. The flavors were rich and just a little tartar sauce topped the whole thing off. A must order! I loved the bread and butter served with the meal as well; the bread had a hard crust and was warm and soft in the middle.
